problem_names:
lemma Fvars_tm_simps[simp]:
  "Fvars Zero = {}"
  "Fvars (Var a) = {a}"
  "Fvars (Eats x y) = Fvars x \<union> Fvars y"

lemma finite_Fvars_tm[simp]:
  fixes t :: tm
  shows "finite (Fvars t)"

lemma Fvars_fm_simps[simp]:
  "Fvars (x IN y) = Fvars x \<union> Fvars y"
  "Fvars (x EQ y) = Fvars x \<union> Fvars y"
  "Fvars (A OR B) = Fvars A \<union> Fvars B"
  "Fvars (A AND B) = Fvars A \<union> Fvars B"
  "Fvars (A IMP B) = Fvars A \<union> Fvars B"
  "Fvars Fls = {}"
  "Fvars (Neg A) = Fvars A"
  "Fvars (Ex a A) = Fvars A - {a}"
  "Fvars (All a A) = Fvars A - {a}"

lemma finite_Fvars_fm[simp]:
  fixes A :: fm
  shows "finite (Fvars A)"

lemma subst_tm_subst_tm[simp]:
  "x \<noteq> y \<Longrightarrow> atom x \<sharp> u \<Longrightarrow> subst y u (subst x t v) = subst x (subst y u t) (subst y u v)"

lemma subst_fm_subst_fm[simp]:
  "x \<noteq> y \<Longrightarrow> atom x \<sharp> u \<Longrightarrow> (A(x::=t))(y::=u) = (A(y::=u))(x::=subst y u t)"
lemma Fvars_ground_aux: "Fvars t \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow> ground_aux t (atom ` B)"
lemma Fvars_ground_fm_aux: "Fvars A \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow> ground_fm_aux A (atom ` B)"
translations:
lemma Fvars_tm_simps[simp]:
  "Fvars Zero = {}"
  "Fvars (Var a) = {a}"
  "Fvars (Eats x y) = Fvars x \<union> Fvars y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Fvars Zero = {} &&&
    Fvars (Var a) = {a} &&& Fvars (Eats x y) = Fvars x \<union> Fvars y

lemma finite_Fvars_tm[simp]:
  fixes t :: tm
  shows "finite (Fvars t)"

lemma Fvars_fm_simps[simp]:
  "Fvars (x IN y) = Fvars x \<union> Fvars y"
  "Fvars (x EQ y) = Fvars x \<union> Fvars y"
  "Fvars (A OR B) = Fvars A \<union> Fvars B"
  "Fvars (A AND B) = Fvars A \<union> Fvars B"
  "Fvars (A IMP B) = Fvars A \<union> Fvars B"
  "Fvars Fls = {}"
  "Fvars (Neg A) = Fvars A"
  "Fvars (Ex a A) = Fvars A - {a}"
  "Fvars (All a A) = Fvars A - {a}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((Fvars (x IN y) = Fvars x \<union> Fvars y &&&
      Fvars (x EQ y) = Fvars x \<union> Fvars y) &&&
     Fvars (A OR B) = Fvars A \<union> Fvars B &&&
     Fvars (A AND B) = Fvars A \<union> Fvars B) &&&
    (Fvars (A IMP B) = Fvars A \<union> Fvars B &&& Fvars Fls = {}) &&&
    Fvars (Neg A) = Fvars A &&&
    Fvars (SyntaxN.Ex a A) = Fvars A - {a} &&&
    Fvars (SyntaxN.All a A) = Fvars A - {a}

lemma finite_Fvars_fm[simp]:
  fixes A :: fm
  shows "finite (Fvars A)"

lemma subst_tm_subst_tm[simp]:
  "x \<noteq> y \<Longrightarrow> atom x \<sharp> u \<Longrightarrow> subst y u (subst x t v) = subst x (subst y u t) (subst y u v)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x \<noteq> y; atom x \<sharp> u\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> subst y u (subst x t v) =
                      subst x (subst y u t) (subst y u v)

lemma subst_fm_subst_fm[simp]:
  "x \<noteq> y \<Longrightarrow> atom x \<sharp> u \<Longrightarrow> (A(x::=t))(y::=u) = (A(y::=u))(x::=subst y u t)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x \<noteq> y; atom x \<sharp> u\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> (A(x::=t))(y::=u) = (A(y::=u))(x::=subst y u t)
by (nominal_induct A avoiding: x t y u rule: fm.strong_induct) auto

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Fvars t \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow> ground_aux t (atom ` B)

 1. ground t = (Fvars t = {})

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. ground t \<Longrightarrow> Fvars t = {}

lemma Fvars_ground_fm_aux: "Fvars A \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow> ground_fm_aux A (atom ` B)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Fvars A \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow> ground_fm_aux A (atom ` B)
apply (induct A arbitrary: B rule: fm.induct)

proof (prove)
goal (5 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1 x2 B.
       Fvars (x1 IN x2) \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
       ground_fm_aux (x1 IN x2) (atom ` B)
 2. \<And>x1 x2 B.
       Fvars (x1 EQ x2) \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
       ground_fm_aux (x1 EQ x2) (atom ` B)
 3. \<And>x1 x2 B.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>B.
                   Fvars x1 \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
                   ground_fm_aux x1 (atom ` B);
        \<And>B.
           Fvars x2 \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
           ground_fm_aux x2 (atom ` B);
        Fvars (x1 OR x2) \<subseteq> B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ground_fm_aux (x1 OR x2) (atom ` B)
 4. \<And>x B.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>B.
                   Fvars x \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
                   ground_fm_aux x (atom ` B);
        Fvars (Neg x) \<subseteq> B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ground_fm_aux (Neg x) (atom ` B)
 5. \<And>x1 x2 B.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>B.
                   Fvars x2 \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
                   ground_fm_aux x2 (atom ` B);
        Fvars (SyntaxN.Ex x1 x2) \<subseteq> B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ground_fm_aux (SyntaxN.Ex x1 x2) (atom ` B)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x1 x2 B.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>B.
                   Fvars x2 \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
                   ground_fm_aux x2 (atom ` B);
        Fvars x2 \<subseteq> insert x1 B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ground_fm_aux x2 (insert (atom x1) (atom ` B))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x1 x2 B.
       \<lbrakk>Fvars x2 \<subseteq> insert x1 B;
        ground_fm_aux x2 (atom ` insert x1 B)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ground_fm_aux x2 (insert (atom x1) (atom ` B))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ground_fm A = (Fvars A = {})

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. ground_fm A \<Longrightarrow> Fvars A = {}
 2. Fvars A = {} \<Longrightarrow> ground_fm A

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Fvars A = {} \<Longrightarrow> ground_fm A

  and substT = "\<lambda>t u x. subst x u t"
  and Fvars = Fvars
  and subst = "\<lambda>A u x. subst_fm A x u"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Generic_Syntax UNIV UNIV UNIV Var Fvars (\<lambda>t u x. subst x u t)
     Fvars (\<lambda>A u x. A(x::=u))

goal (17 subgoals):
 1. infinite UNIV
 2. \<And>x. x \<in> UNIV \<Longrightarrow> Var x \<in> UNIV
 3. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>x \<in> UNIV; y \<in> UNIV\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (Var x = Var y) = (x = y)
 4. \<And>t. t \<in> UNIV \<Longrightarrow> finite (Fvars t)
 5. \<And>t. t \<in> UNIV \<Longrightarrow> Fvars t \<subseteq> UNIV
 6. \<And>t1 t x.
       \<lbrakk>t1 \<in> UNIV; t \<in> UNIV; x \<in> UNIV\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> subst x t t1 \<in> UNIV

 8. \<And>x t y.
       \<lbrakk>x \<in> UNIV; y \<in> UNIV; t \<in> UNIV\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> subst y t (Var x) = (if x = y then t else Var x)
 9. \<And>t1 t2 x.
       \<lbrakk>x \<in> UNIV; t1 \<in> UNIV; t2 \<in> UNIV;
        x \<notin> Fvars t1\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> subst x t2 t1 = t1
 10. \<And>\<phi>. \<phi> \<in> UNIV \<Longrightarrow> finite (Fvars \<phi>)

interpretation g2: Goedel_Second_Assumptions where

  and fls = "Fls"
  and prv = "(\<turnstile>) {}"
